title: Kinematic Assessment Training Program for Observing Upper Limb Hemiplegia [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Kinesiology Theory and Understanding of Neurological Disorders
context.additional_context: Video-based assessment training using personal devices, aiming to improve accuracy through feedback provision.

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% evaluation accuracy in three categories—speed, smoothness, and indirectness of path—through upper limb motion video analysis
Maintain evaluation accuracy above 25% for one week after training incorporating knowledge results (KR) feedback
Reduce the error between 3D kinematic analysis data and observer ratings by an average of 35% or more
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
